title: Drawing, "Sketches: trees, landscape", July 1844
medium:
Recto: Graphite on paper
Verso: Black crayon on paper
inscribed: Recto:  Inscribed in ? with date at top right.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view with a tree at center left, two trees and bushes at right.
Verso: Distant view of a lake, shown across hills and against a background of mountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches: trees, landscape", July 1844.
July 1844. Recto: Graphite on paper
Verso: Black crayon on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-3-a.
